name: Simple Blog
description: A simple blog application with posts, comments, and user authentication

customIssues.title: Create Post Model and Migration
customIssues.description: Create Post model with title, content, author, published_at fields

customIssues.title: Create Comment System
customIssues.description: Implement nested comments with moderation support

customIssues.title: Build Blog Post Editor
customIssues.description: Rich text editor with markdown support and image uploads

customIssues.title: Implement Blog Homepage
customIssues.description: Display recent posts with pagination and categories
